root: ^There is nothing wrong with being a common wound
^It means the healing is common too
^When the people of the city look past that
^shop that Gerald got when he came back from the war or that
^tree where music played and foots city-wide tapped to the 8-count
^When you truly love something, you have the right to destroy it.
^This will not end well for you
^But you will get exactly what you wanted—
